metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30640 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability in the JNDI Realm of Apache Tomcat allows an attacker toauthenticate using variations of a valid user name and/or to bypass some ofthe protection provided by the LockOut Realm. This issue affects ApacheTomcat 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.5; 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.45; 8.5.0 to 8.5.65.

criterions.comment: tomcat6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
